column2: Setting the `off` event (i.e., 'plotly_doubleclick') to match the `on` event (i.e., 'plotly_click'). You can change this default via the `highlight()` function.
Setting the `off` event (i.e., 'plotly_doubleclick') to match the `on` event (i.e., 'plotly_click'). You can change this default via the `highlight()` function.
